subject: Investing
title: The BRRRR Strategy
description: A fast breakdown of The BRRRR Strategy for builders.

hook.text: An investor recycled the same $50,000 to buy four rental properties in three years.

buildup.text: BRRRR stands for Buy, Rehab, Rent, Refinance, Repeatâ€”a strategy to recycle down-payment capital.

discovery.text: After rehab, the property appraises higher. A cash-out refinance returns most of your original cash.

twist.text: If the rehab costs balloon or the appraisal falls short, your cash stays trapped in the deal.

climax.text: Successful BRRRR investors run precise rehab budgets and know local appraisal standards cold.

punchline.text: BRRRR turns one down payment into a conveyor belt of rentals.

quiz.question: What does the second 'R' in BRRRR stand for?
